findings.title: Token Allocation mismatch
findings.description: Some of the DART token allocation amounts for specific categories don’t match with the actual tokenomics document provided.

findings.title: Improper use of decimal points for DART token
findings.description: Using 10^18 to assign token allocation amounts to State Variables can be replaced with globally available Ether Units (ether) for better code readability.

findings.title: Absence of Error messages in Require Statements
findings.description: None of the require statements in the contract doesn’t include an error message, making it troublesome to detect the reason behind a particular function revert and reducing code readability.
